etymologies: late 18th century: apparently from a West African language

definitions: a gum obtained from certain tropical trees by tapping, used locally as an astringent in medicine and in tanning.

notes.text: The trees belong to genera in various families, in particular Pterocarpus and Butea (family Leguminosae)

shortDefinitions: gum obtained from certain tropical trees by tapping, used locally as astringent in medicine and in tanning
